text: Robert Lawrence Stine (born October 8, 1943), known as R. L. Stine, is an American horror fiction author. He is also a television producer. He is known for creating the Goosebumps and Fear Street book series. Stine was born to a Jewish family in Columbus, Ohio. R.L. Stine was the son of Lewis Stine, a shipping clerk, and Anne Feinstein. Stine grew up in Bexley, Ohio. Stine began writing at the age of nine, when he found a typewriter in his attic, subsequently beginning to type stories and joke books. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * *R. L.
